Text: It will be interesting to see if they ever manage to release album #13... 200 Motels.  It's been skipped (although it's number is being held open).  Because it was owned by United Artist, it wasn't first made available on CD until Ryko got ahold of it in 1997. If Ryko's only had a one-shot deal, the ZFT/UMe may have to renegotiate it's release all over again. In any event, these shares are a thing of beauty for those of us who already own the vinyl and both sets of Ryko/BP CDs, thanks Cy!
thanks for this. Great Mothers album
I just noticed that they skipped #7 as well as #13 (200 Motels)... one can only presume it's for the compilation "Mothermania".
